Convex experimental design using manifold structure for image retrieval
publication.authors: chun chen,wei chen,jiajun bu,deng cai,xiaofei he
publication.keyword: Active Learning;Content Based Image Retrieval;Convex Optimization;Experimental Design;Geometric Structure;Image Retrieval;Optimization Problem;Ranking Function;Regression Model;Relevance Feedback;Semantic Gap;semidefinite program;Interior Point Method;Least Square Error;
publication.abstract: Content Based Image Retrieval (CBIR) has become one of the most active research areas in computer science. Relevance feedback is often used in CBIR systems to bridge the semantic gap. Typically, users are asked to make relevance judgements on some query results, and the feedback information is then used to re-rank the images in the database. An effective relevance feedback
